# Card readers

In the JavaFX browser is integration of nfc card readers for the UiTPAS cards and for eID readers of Belgian identification cards.

## nfc cards
```
  readNfc(chipNumber/uitpasNumber/inszNumber)
  readNfc('044C539AFF2080') = chipNumber
  readNfc('1000000397215') = uitpasNumber
  readNfc('80020200181') = inszNumber
```

## eID cards
```
  readEid(firstname, lastname, insz, dateOfBirth, placeOfBirth, gender, nationality, street, postalCode, city)
  readEid('Mark', 'Smith', '80020200181', '02/02/1980', 'Brussels', 'M', 'Belg', 'Bondgenotenlaan 5', '3000', 'Leuven')
```

```
  readEidPhoto(base64 encoded picture string)
  readEidPhoto('')
```

Read the full documentation here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ajOglZsbSFm2tek7C6HrxeHIXv_k4P0ECn1sM9GNBZo/edit#
